member.name: T:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientCodeGenerator
member.summary: Generator to create client source code based of candid definitions from `.did` files or from a canister id

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientCodeGenerator.GenerateClientFromCanisterAsync(EdjCase.ICP.Candid.Models.Principal,EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions)
member.summary: Creates client source code for a canister based on its id. This only works if the canister has the `candid:service` meta data available in its public state
member.param: The canister to get the definition from
Optional. The http boundry node url to use, otherwise uses the default

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientCodeGenerator.GenerateClientFromFile(System.String,EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions)
member.summary: Generates client source code for a canister based on a `.did` file definition
member.param: The text content of the `.did` definition file

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientCodeGenerator.GenerateClient(EdjCase.ICP.Candid.Models.CandidServiceDescription,EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions)
member.summary: Generates client source code for a canister based on a `.did` file definition
member.param: The service definition to generate the client from

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions.Name
member.summary: The name of the client class and file to use

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions.Namespace
member.summary: The base namespace to use in the generated files

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions.OutputDirectory
member.summary: If true, there will be no folders, all files will be in the same directory

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions.FeatureNullable
member.summary: If true, the nullable C# feature will be used

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions.KeepCandidCase
member.summary: If true, the names of properties and methods will keep the raw candid name. Otherwise they will be converted to something prettier

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions.Types
member.summary: Optional. Specifies options for each candid type in the definition. Only supports named types, no anonymous types

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientGenerationOptions.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Uri,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ITypeOptions})
member.param: The name of the client class and file to use
The base namespace to use in the generated files
If true, there will be no folders, all files will be in the same directory
If true, the nullable C# feature will be used
If true, the names of properties and methods will keep the raw candid name. Otherwise they will be converted to something prettier
Optional. Specifies options for each candid type in the definition

member.name: T:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientSyntax
member.summary: A model containing the client code to be rendered

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientSyntax.ClientFile
member.summary: The syntax of the client file

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientSyntax.TypeFiles
member.summary: The syntax of different declared types for the client

member.param: The syntax of the client file
The syntax of different declared types for the client

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientSyntax.Rewrite(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CSharpSyntaxRewriter)
member.summary: Rewrites the syntax with the specified `CSharpSyntaxRewriter`
member.param: A `CSharpSyntaxRewriter` to rewrite the csharp syntax

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientSyntax.GenerateFileContents
member.summary: Converts the file syntax objects into source code string values to use as a file
member.returns: Client and type source code file contents

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientSyntax.GenerateFileContents(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.CompilationUnitSyntax)
member.summary: Helper function to turn a client or type into a string of file contents
member.param: The client or type file to convert to a string
member.returns: String source code of the specified syntax
